member.name: M:MyApi.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.DeleteForecast(System.Int32,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Delete a weather forecast by ID and date.
member.remarks: This endpoint deletes a weather forecast based on the provided ID and date. The date must be in the format yyyy-MM-dd. Example: /weather/1/2025-04-30.
member.param: The ID of the weather forecast to delete (default: 1).
The date of the weather forecast to delete (default: 2025-01-01).
member.response: No content - The weather forecast was successfully deleted.
Bad request - The date format is invalid.
Not found - The weather forecast with the specified ID and date does not exist.
